column1: Ohtar was the squire of Isildur.

Ohtar was apparently a Dúnedain of Arnor and by the first years of the Third Age he was fully trained and experienced and had attained the rank of "Soldier". He served as the squire of High King of the Dúnedain Isildur
He accompanied Isildurs retinue from Gondor to Arnor
column2: when they were ambushed by the Gladden Fields. Ohtar was one of only three survivors of the Disaster of the Gladden Fields. He rescued the shards of Elendils sword
column4: and brought them safely back to Rivendell.
